summary: Add support for the new Worker Versioning API in the Ruby SDK through workflow annotations. This involves implementing design specifications documented in a cross-SDK design document, with Go SDK as the reference implementation.
userImpact: Users can adopt the new Worker Versioning API in Ruby, enabling safe deployment strategies and maintaining compatibility across workflow versions.
proposedFix: Implement workflow annotations following the cross-SDK design specification referenced in the feature document, aligned with Go SDK implementation.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to support the new Worker Versioning API with appropriate annotations for the Ruby SDK.
keyQuote: We need to add annotations to workflows to support the new versioning APIs. Refer to temporalio/features#548 for the Go equivalents.
